title: Moon to Visit Thailand, Mexico and Chile Next Month
text:
President Moon Jae-in will visit Thailand next week to attend an annual meeting with leaders of Asian countries.

Cheong Wa Dae said on Monday that Moon will attend the ASEAN Plus Three Summit in Thailand from Nov. 3 to 5.

Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is also scheduled to attend the event, so there is a chance for Moon to talk with Abe in Bangkok in a bid to mend soured bilateral relations between the two countries.

Then Moon will head to Mexico and Chile. He will meet with Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador during his visit on Nov. 13-14 and attend the APEC Summit slated for Nov. 16-17 in Santiago, Chile.

Cheong Wa Dae spokeswoman Ko Min-jung said, "We are currently arranging meetings with key countries on the sidelines of the APEC Summit."
description: Moon to Visit Thailand, Mexico and Chile Next Month
